sentences.en: A man seen hanging around the area prior to the shooting could have been involved.
sentences.cn: 在枪杀案发生之前，有人目睹一位男子在这附近游荡，该男子可能与此案有关。

sentences.en: All the arrangements should be completed prior to your departure.
sentences.cn: 你离开之前一切都要安排好。

sentences.en: Although not essential, some prior knowledge of statistics is desirable.
sentences.cn: 统计学的知识虽非必要，但最好是学过一点。

sentences.en: Anglers are required to obtain prior authorization from the park keeper.
sentences.cn: 垂钓者必须事先得到公园管理者的许可.

sentences.en: Changes may not be made without the prior approval of the council.
sentences.cn: 未经委员会事先同意，不得作出改变。

sentences.en: For the prior year, they reported net income of $1.1 million.
sentences.cn: 他们公布上一年度纯收入为110万美元。

sentences.en: He knew about the interview prior to its publication and had actually previewed the piece.
sentences.cn: 这篇访谈在发表以前他就已经知道了，并且实际上还预先阅览过。

sentences.en: He made the decision without my prior knowledge or consent.
sentences.cn: 他瞒着我做出了决定.

sentences.en: His answer was tinted by his prior knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他的回答说明他先前就有所了解.

sentences.en: His own children have a prior claim to the business.
sentences.cn: 他自己的孩子可以优先获得这家企业。

sentences.en: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
sentences.cn: 我不定义任何东西，不管是美，还是爱国。每件事在我眼里该是什么就是什么，没有什么优先规则使之应该成为什么。

sentences.en: I saw him prior to leaving.
sentences.cn: 离开前我见到了他.

sentences.en: I took up one - year prior course in German in this college.
sentences.cn: 我在这所大学读了一年的德语预科.

sentences.en: It happened prior to his arrival.
sentences.cn: 这事发生在他到达以前.

sentences.en: It happened prior to my arrival.
sentences.cn: 这发生在我到达之前.

sentences.en: Just phone in your order three or more days prior to departure.
sentences.cn: 在出发的三天之前打电话预订即可。

sentences.en: No one had prior knowledge of her stunt on the stage.
sentences.cn: 没有人事先知道她在舞台上有那样的惊人之举。

sentences.en: she visited me on the day prior to her death.
sentences.cn: 她去世的前一天还来看我。

sentences.en: Some prior experience with the software is needed.
sentences.cn: 要求事先熟悉这个软件。

sentences.en: The duty to protect my sister is prior to all others.
sentences.cn: 保护我的妹妹是我最重要的责任.

sentences.en: They all raised the question as if by prior agreement.
sentences.cn: 他们都不约而同地提出了这个问题.

sentences.en: They have a prior claim to the property.
sentences.cn: 他们有权优先获得该处房产。

sentences.en: Vegetarian meals are provided by prior agreement.
sentences.cn: 经事先协商可提供素食。

sentences.en: What did you do prior to coming here?
sentences.cn: 你来这里之前做什么事?

sentences.en: While we are at it, notice that the prior servers probably do the wrong thing in that they feed each new batch of records only to one client.
sentences.cn: 在我们这样做的时候，请注意以前的服务器可能会犯错误，因为它们只向一个客户机提供每批新记录。

sentences.en: You do not need any prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.cn: 你无需事先具备该方面的知识。

words.tran_cn: 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事
把事情按优先顺序排好

phrases.tran_cn: 事先批准；预先审批；事前批准；事前许可；预先核准

trans.tran_en: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation

trans.tran_cn: 小修道院院长，大修道院的副院长，（隐修院）会长，[史]行政长官，普赖尔
